name: Gerasimos Kammenou
story: Gerasimos comes from a military family and has always known that he wanted to follow in the footsteps of his father and grandfather. He has a natural aptitude for handling weapons and explosives, and quickly earned a reputation as one of the best missile specialists in his unit. Despite his young age, Gerasimos is a respected leader and never shies away from taking charge in high-pressure situations.
